title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9760.6 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9760.6 - Public notice

State Regulations
A public notice shall be posted in the building where the
records access officer is located stating the location and telephone number of
such officer, the locations where records shall be made available for
inspection and copying, and the right to appeal by any person denied access to
a record and the name and public office address of the person to whom an appeal
is to be directed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9760.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
